column4: anybody have any idea how to get a SATA DVD drive working on a mixed IDE/SATA system?
if it's plugged in to the sata controller, shouldn't work as  normal?
no, doesn't - mplayer can't read it as a DVD driev
but is there a device file for it in /dev?
mplayer may need to be told which device to look at
it's looking at /dev/dvd which is sym linked to /dev/sr0
and you're sure sr0 is the right device?
I've installed the CSS stuff, that is hush hush
hmm...sorry, not sure what to tell you. you might try looking through the mplayer web site; see if this is a known issue
ok, will do. Thanks. could be the make I suppose
